So much for going on a job with just my Apple Watch

So much for going on a job with just my Apple Watch — Daring Fireball’s John Gruber: “the Watch is effectively a remote display for an extension running on your iPhone. This should be good for Watch battery life, but limiting when you’re not carrying your iPhone.”

Enjoy your day.
